caption.p: Combinatorial effects of UV-C treatments (0–10.8 kJ/m 2) on morphology of callu cultures of F. indica grown for 30 days under light regimes; ( a) P1–P2 stands for UV-C treated cultures in photoperiod (16L/8D h), ( b) C1–C7 represents UV-C elicited cultures in cont. light (24 h) and ( c) D1–D2 shows UV-C mediated cultures in complete dark (24 h).
